name: Test_quotable_api_with_tags_pages_queryparams

children.description: Given the api is composed of "https://api.quotable.io/"
Given A call to quotable api with path as "quotes"

Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
| property | value |
| tags | friendship |
| page | 2 |

reportData.title: Response Body with status code : 200
reportData.contents:
{
    "count": 20,
    "totalCount": 187,
    "page": 2,
    "totalPages": 10,
    "lastItemIndex": 40,
    "results": [
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "KsFj1hU_I3",
            "content": "True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity, before it is entitled to the appellation.",
            "author": "George Washington",
            "authorSlug": "george-washington",
            "length": 140,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-28",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-28"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "-0DZUCVFcb",
            "content": "Friendship is Love without his wings!",
            "author": "Lord Byron",
            "authorSlug": "lord-byron",
            "length": 37,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-26",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-26"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes",
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "zJCNH3Q5shhD",
            "content": "Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.",
            "author": "Euripides",
            "authorSlug": "euripides",
            "length": 62,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-26",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-26"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "Dk5eYrHsEs",
            "content": "Friends are the siblings God never gave us.",
            "author": "Mencius",
            "authorSlug": "mencius",
            "length": 43,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-26",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-26"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "eobAW2Ou0",
            "content": "You win the victory when you yield to friends.",
            "author": "Sophocles",
            "authorSlug": "sophocles",
            "length": 46,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-26",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-26"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "Aj1hWd83aS",
            "content": "It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, can never know what true friendship means.",
            "author": "Charles Kingsley",
            "authorSlug": "charles-kingsley",
            "length": 119,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-08",
            "dateModified": "2021-06-17"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes",
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "4CYX4OWZ4S-W",
            "content": "A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.",
            "author": "Leo Buscaglia",
            "authorSlug": "leo-buscaglia",
            "length": 60,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-08",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-08"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "wIfNy-oDtr",
            "content": "Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.",
            "author": "Dag Hammarskjöld",
            "authorSlug": "dag-hammarskjold",
            "length": 84,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-08",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-08"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "Q8AlUDqUpT",
            "content": "Sustaining true friendship is a lot more challenging than we give it credit for.",
            "author": "Mariella Frostrup",
            "authorSlug": "mariella-frostrup",
            "length": 80,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-08",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-08"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "C5_AURs6v6",
            "content": "Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.",
            "author": "Thomas Aquinas",
            "authorSlug": "thomas-aquinas",
            "length": 120,
            "dateAdded": "2021-02-27",
            "dateModified": "2021-02-27"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes",
                "friendship",
                "self-help"
            ],
            "_id": "RP2z5Ir_xwF2",
            "content": "When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.",
            "author": "William Arthur Ward",
            "authorSlug": "william-arthur-ward",
            "length": 88,
            "dateAdded": "2021-02-27",
            "dateModified": "2021-02-27"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "8ry084PzfT",
            "content": "A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.",
            "author": "William C. Menninger",
            "authorSlug": "william-c-menninger",
            "length": 153,
            "dateAdded": "2021-02-27",
            "dateModified": "2021-02-27"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "z-mSLKd0hm",
            "content": "Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.",
            "author": "Herodotus",
            "authorSlug": "herodotus",
            "length": 49,
            "dateAdded": "2021-02-27",
            "dateModified": "2021-02-27"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "Yl8o9gfnbm",
            "content": "The world is round so that friendship may encircle it.",
            "author": "Pierre Teilhard de Chardin",
            "authorSlug": "pierre-teilhard-de-chardin",
            "length": 54,
            "dateAdded": "2021-02-12",
            "dateModified": "2021-02-12"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "yHmYezfz4G",
            "content": "Business, you know, may bring you money, but friendship hardly ever does.",
            "author": "Jane Austen",
            "authorSlug": "jane-austen",
            "length": 73,
            "dateAdded": "2021-02-12",
            "dateModified": "2021-02-12"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "OwQANbtdRT",
            "content": "My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.",
            "author": "Henry Ford",
            "authorSlug": "henry-ford",
            "length": 56,
            "dateAdded": "2021-01-30",
            "dateModified": "2021-01-30"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "1pk3RmCB6q",
            "content": "We must reach out our hand in friendship and dignity both to those who would befriend us and those who would be our enemy.",
            "author": "Arthur Ashe",
            "authorSlug": "arthur-ashe",
            "length": 122,
            "dateAdded": "2021-01-30",
            "dateModified": "2021-01-30"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "Chvu_626SS",
            "content": "The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.",
            "author": "Henry David Thoreau",
            "authorSlug": "henry-david-thoreau",
            "length": 56,
            "dateAdded": "2021-01-20",
            "dateModified": "2021-01-20"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "YRWT98QBEC",
            "content": "Love and friendship exclude each other.",
            "author": "Jean de La Bruyère",
            "authorSlug": "jean-de-la-bruyere",
            "length": 39,
            "dateAdded": "2021-01-20",
            "dateModified": "2021-01-20"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "friendship"
            ],
            "_id": "N-_tRxD3bY",
            "content": "Rejoicing in our joy, not suffering over our suffering, makes someone a friend.",
            "author": "Friedrich Nietzsche",
            "authorSlug": "friedrich-nietzsche",
            "length": 79,
            "dateAdded": "2021-01-20",
            "dateModified": "2021-01-20"
        }
    ]
}

userStory.narrative: I want to automate the QuotableAPI and validate the various functionalities

title: Test quotable api with tags pages queryparams

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given A call to quotable api with path as "<path>"
Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
When response code is "200"
Then validate the total count "<totalCount>"

scenarioOutline:
Given A call to quotable api with path as "<path>"
Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
|property | value|
|tags | <tagValue>|
|page | <pageValue>|
When response code is "200"
Then validate the total count "<totalCount>"
